name: Input.mousePosition
description:
(input.mousePosition); is a game where you can control your player only by mouse position. In other word moving your mouse. the velocity of bullets and rate of fire depends on it...

well, hi my name is vishnu and i am 15 years old and this is my first game.

that`s why it doesn`t have any audio, options,menu cause i don`t know how to do those things

how to play:

you can control the player only by using cursor or mouse position

the speed of the player depends on the distance between the player and the cursor.if the distance is large, the player moves fast.

the rate of fire and velocity of bullets depends on the player`s velocity. if the player`s speed is high so do the rate of fire and velocity of bullet.

you got only one hit point so don`t die

and remember  the only  control is mouse position so press alt+f4 to exit
